metadata.synopsis: Marcia's (Rita Blanco) plan to lead her family out of the Lisbon slums is threatened by her daughter's affair with a married professor and her son's involvement in dealing drugs.

reviews: Portuguese director Joao Canijo returns with his eighth feature, Blood of My Blood, a sprawling, all consuming portrait of one week in the life a matriarchal run familial unit in the slums outside Lisbon, and may indeed be his masterpiece.
